summary: Page 23 (book page 43/mem-gimel) covers sections 70-76. Structure and section numbers are correct. Right column read first then left. Some minor text discrepancies but overall well-captured. The continuation fragment and source refs are mostly accurate.

issues.description: In the image the makor text reads 'כי שו"ב יותר' at the start, but OCR has 'כי טוב יותר'. The abbreviation שו"ב (שכר בעוה"ז) was misread as טוב.
The source ref has a leading vav prefix: 'ומעגלי צדק בחוקותי'. It should be 'מעגלי צדק בחוקותי' without the vav, as source refs should not include conjunctive prefixes.
